item.description:
This meetup began in September 2008... so we have been meeting to enjoy Indian food, explore Indian culture, and discuss Indian books for three years!  If you have attended two or more meetups with our group, you are invited to attend our Anniversary Celebration dinner in September.  We will not be discussing any particular book... but you might want to use this opportunity to read a book you missed (you can see all of them in Past Meetups), or to re-read a favorite!  I will bring a list of the books we have read, and we will talk about our favorites (and our not-so-favorites).   If you would like to share a bit of a book you really liked, that would be good also!

Since we will be meeting on a Friday evening, I will really appreciate careful attention to RSVPs.  I will try to reserve space at the restaurant.
item.name: Indian Food, Indian Fiction - Third Anniversary Celebration!
